q: In Automatic testing, which of the following factors determines the quality of the test execution process?

Which of the following must be considered during the test-execution process:

  1. Execute tests, report bugs, and capture test status continuously
  2. Assign test cases in each test suite to testers for execution
  3. Blocking issues need not be resolved as they never arise
  4. Report status, adjust assignments and reconsider plans and priorities as and when required
